title: Rodgers/McCarthy Feud, Lakers Desperation, Patriots' Plan and NBA Regular Season Woes
itunes:title: Rodgers/McCarthy Feud, Lakers Desperation, Patriots' Plan and NBA Regular Season Woes
description:
Colin goes deeper into the Bleacher Report about the former Green Bay Packers HC Mike McCarthy and QB Aaron Rodgers, why the Los Angeles Lakers are in desperation mode, a possible plan for the New England Patriots, and why he is starting to not care about the NBA regular season. Guests include Tyler Dunne, Mark Medina, Rob Parker, Christian Laettner, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
